what: Index of Multiple Deprivation Data for the UK
title: Index of Multiple Deprivation Data for the UK
text: IMD package provides easy access Indices Multiple Deprivation UK’s nations various geographical levels: England: Lower Layer Super Output Area (LSOA), Middle Layer Super Output Area (MSOA), Local Authority, Integrated Care Board, Local Resilience Forum (includes new data 2025) Wales: LSOA, MSOA, Ward, Local Authority Scotland: Data Zone, Intermediate Zone, Council Area Northern Ireland: Super Output Area Local Government District package also provides data files Community Needs Index UK nation, well household-level multiple deprivation figures England, Wales Northern Ireland (2011 2021 Censuses).

title: Index of Multiple Deprivation Data for the UK
text: Install released version IMD CRAN: Alternatively, can install development version GitHub :

title: Index of Multiple Deprivation Data for the UK

what: Composite 2020 UK Index of Multiple Deprivation
title: Index of Multiple Deprivation Data for the UK
text: also included composite 2020 UK Index Multiple Deprivation produced mySociety, allowing comparison deprivation across UK nations. information use version IMD, see README. Rather providing copy data, IMD package loads data hosted mySociety’s GitHub. load files, run following code: function defaults loading England-focused composite index; change nation parameter first letter one devolved UK nations load versions.

title: Aggregate deprivation scores — aggregate_scores

title: Aggregate deprivation scores — aggregate_scores
text: data Data frame containing variable aggregated, lower level geography population estimates, higher level geographical grouping variable score_col Variable containing deprivation scores rank_col Variable containing deprivation ranks decile_col Variable containing deprivation deciles higher_level_geography Name variable data frame containing higher level geography names/codes population Name variable data frame containing population estimates lower level geography

title: Aggregate deprivation scores — aggregate_scores
text: tibble containing population-weighted average scores,     proportions highly deprived areas, extent     higher-level geography.

title: Extent — calculate_extent
text: extent calculates 'extent' scores aggregating small areas.

title: Extent — calculate_extent
Extent — calculate_extent
text: data Data frame containing variable aggregated, lower level geography population estimates, higher level geographical grouping variable var Name variable data frame containing variable aggregated (e.g. rank) lower level geography higher_level_geography Name variable data frame containing higher level geography names/codes population Name variable data frame containing population estimates lower level geography

title: Extent — calculate_extent
text: "Extent" proportion local population live areas classified among deprived higher geography. calculation extent taken IMD technical report Appendix N: "population living deprived 11 30 per cent Lower-layer Super Output Areas receive sliding weight, ranging 0.95 deprived eleventh percentile, 0.05 deprived thirtieth percentile. practice means weight starts 0.95 deprived eleventh percentile, decreases (0.95-0.05)/19 subsequent nineteen percentiles reaches 0.05 deprived thirtieth percentile, zero areas outside deprived 30 per cent"
